org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl

Class ReconciliationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openidm.sync.impl.ReconciliationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, Reconcile

    @Service
@Properties(value={@Property(name="service.description",value="Reconciliation Service"),@Property(name="service.vendor",value="ForgeRock AS"),@Property(name="openidm.router.prefix",value="/recon/*")})
public class ReconciliationService
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler, Reconcile
    Reconciliation service implementation

      • reconcile

        public String reconcile(ReconciliationService.ReconAction reconAction,
               org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue mapping,
               Boolean synchronous,
               org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue reconParams,
               org.forgerock.json.fluent.JsonValue config)
                 throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
        Reconcile the given mapping according to the requested options
        Specified by:
        reconcile in interface Reconcile
        Parameters:
        reconAction - the recon action
        mapping - the mapping configuration
        synchronous - whether to synchronously (TRUE) wait for the reconciliation run, or to return immediately (FALSE) with the recon id, which can then be used for subsequent queries / actions on that reconciliation run.
        reconParams - all parameters passed to the recon invocation
        config - the overriding config
        Throws:
        org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException
